instituted  these  proceedings  before  the  District  Court  of  Colombo  seeking
inter alia that the land described in the 2nd schedule to the amended plaint
be partitioned amongst himself and the1st and 2nd defendant respondents in
the manner set out in the amended plaint dated 26.04.1991.

been re-registered under the provisions of the Companies Act No. 7 of 2007.
The  Supreme  Court  allowed  Communication  and  Business  Equipment  (Pvt)
Ltd. (now known as Apogee International (Pvt) Ltd) to be substituted in place
of the original 3rd defendant company.

fter  trial,  the  Learned  Additional  District  Judge  of  Colombo  delivered  the
